typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		System as string,
		{Allocated Space (GB)} as string,
		{Used Space (GB)} as string,
		{Free Space (GB)} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> VaishSourceFIle
VaishSourceFIle derive({Allocated Space (GB)} = toDouble({Allocated Space (GB)}),
		{Used Space (GB)} = toDouble({Used Space (GB)}),
		{Free Space (GB)} = toDouble({Free Space (GB)}),
		allocatedSpaceOriginal = {Allocated Space (GB)}) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 aggregate(groupBy(System),
	{Allocated Space (GB)} = max({Allocated Space (GB)})) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> destsink
